appName: Train Sim World® VR: New York
displayName: Train Sim World® VR: New York
display_name: Train Sim World® VR: New York
display_long_description:
# Be a Part of It

The pinnacle of train simulation is coming to VR! Train Sim World VR: New York is a realistic and fun train driving experience like no other. Step into the driver’s seat of a real-world train and transport passengers along the Big Apple’s Harlem Line.
[media]

Jump into Career Mode and start as a Rookie Engineer on the Harlem Line. Receive instructions and challenges from management and progress your career.

Play a more chilled out and relaxing experience with Journey Mode. Hop out of your train and visit all the stations along the Harlem Line, go exploring for collectables, and interact with the environment.

When you’re not out driving trains and exploring the secrets of the Harlem Line, decorate, chill out, and interact with your New York apartment (perhaps the most unrealistic part of Train Sim World VR).

If you can make it here, you can make it anywhere

[media]

[media]
